<?php
require_once ABSPATH . 'wp-load.php';

// Create a demo custom post type and taxonomy for testing
register_post_type('genre', array(
	'public' => true,
	'label' => 'Genres',
	'supports' => array('title', 'editor'),
	'show_in_rest' => true,
));

register_taxonomy('genre_tax', 'genre', array(
	'public' => true,
	'label' => 'Genre Categories',
	'show_in_rest' => true,
));

// Configure the sync pair
$pairs = array(
	array(
		'cpt_slug' => 'genre',
		'taxonomy_slug' => 'genre_tax',
		'enable_redirect' => false,
	),
);
update_option('cpt_tax_syncer_pairs', $pairs);

// Create a few demo posts to showcase syncing
wp_insert_post(array(
	'post_title' => 'Comedy',
	'post_type' => 'genre',
	'post_status' => 'publish',
));

wp_insert_post(array(
	'post_title' => 'Drama',
	'post_type' => 'genre',
	'post_status' => 'publish',
));

wp_insert_post(array(
	'post_title' => 'Action',
	'post_type' => 'genre',
	'post_status' => 'publish',
));
